comment: Stop calling progressive movements "Cultural Marxism". The term is a slander campaign used by the alt lite to conflate the economic left and progressive liberals.
amr:
# ::snt Stop calling progressive movements "Cultural Marxism". The term is a slander campaign used by the alt lite to conflate the economic left and progressive liberals.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / stop-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / call-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (m2 / movement-07
                        :ARG1-of (p / progressive-02))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / political-movement
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Marxism")
                        :mod (c2 / culture))))
      :snt2 (c3 / campaign-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / slander-01)
            :domain (t / term)
            :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :mod (a / alt))
                  :ARG2 (c4 / conflate-01
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :ARG1 (l / left-19
                              :ARG2 (e / economy))
                        :ARG2 (p4 / person
                              :ARG1-of (l2 / liberal-02)
                              :ARG1-of (p5 / progressive-02))))))

            :ARG0 (y / you)

comment: Just because you disagree with someone, doesn't mean they are less intelligent than you.
